heading: HR01502
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REINSURANCE CONTRACTS AWARDED TO DOMESTIC INSURANCE COMPANIES BY THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01502
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REINSURANCE CONTRACTS AWARDED TO DOMESTIC INSURANCE COMPANIES BY THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D.
DATE FILED : 2017-12-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-02-08
          -TWG created, to be chaired by Rep. Mark Go
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-26
          -1st TWG meeting
      3. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-03-05
          -2nd TWG, DBM to submit requirements on procurement
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2018-01-17
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-12-05;
